profile.description: Ex trader and portfolio manager with extensive work experience in the financial service sector across various functions working for blue chip companies in Frankfurt, London and Zurich who developed strong interest in responsible finance, sustainability and innovation.  •	Set up e-business incubation unit for multinational during dot.com boom •	Pioneered implementation of EU carbon emission trading •	Involved in commercialisation of innovative clean technologies •	Contributed to development of nascent crowdfunding market  •	Early adopter of cryptocurrency and blockchain technology  Escaped the ‘City’ to make an impact in developing sustainable businesses and disrupting traditional energy and finance system via new business models.   Believes we should ‘trust in math’ and facts rather than central organisations.
profile.name: Rex Kempcke
